FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"

) AS t

) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-07 14:53:01.565 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-07 14:53:01.569 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-07 14:59:59.712 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-07 15:00:02.379 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-07 15:00:06.201 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-07 15:00:06.204 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-07 15:03:18.568 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-07 15:03:18.574 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

2025-08-07 17:25:02.711 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-08 14:57:17.833 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-08 16:02:50.991 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (45ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0

FROM (
    SELECT b."Id", b."CreatedDate", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId"
    FROM "Baskets" AS b
    WHERE b."Id" = @__basket_Id_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."BasketId"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-08 16:53:39.754 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-08 16:54:10.648 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT count(*)::int
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-08-08 16:54:10.651 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-08-08 20:20:07.106 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (28ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"

SELECT t."Id", t."Address", t."CreatedDate", t."Description", t."OrderCode", t."UpdatedDate", b."Id", b."CreatedDate", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId", a."Id", a."AccessFailedCount", a."ConcurrencyStamp", a."Email", a."EmailConfirmed", a."LockoutEnabled", a."LockoutEnd", a."NameSurname", a."NormalizedEmail", a."NormalizedUserName", a."PasswordHash", a."PhoneNumber", a."PhoneNumberConfirmed", a."RefreshToken", a."RefreshTokenEndDate", a."SecurityStamp", a."TwoFactorEnabled", a."UserName", t0."Id", t0."BasketId", t0."CreatedDate", t0."ProductId", t0."Quantity", t0."UpdatedDate", t0."Id0", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate0"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."Address", o."CreatedDate", o."Description", o."OrderCode", o."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON b."Id" = t0."BasketId"
ORDER BY t."Id", b."Id", a."Id", t0."Id"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p

) AS t

    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

2025-08-09 12:17:36.966 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

2025-08-09 12:18:19.687 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

2025-08-09 12:34:04.562 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

2025-08-09 13:26:51.330 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

2025-08-09 13:27:04.163 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    SELECT o."Id", o."Address", o."CreatedDate", o."Description", o."OrderCode", o."UpdatedDate", b."Id" AS "Id0", b."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", b."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0", b."UserId"

    WHERE o."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t

    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT o."Id", o."Address", o."CreatedDate", o."Description", o."OrderCode", o."UpdatedDate", b."Id" AS "Id0", b."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", b."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0", b."UserId"

    INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON o."Id" = b."Id"
    WHERE o."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t

    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"

) AS t0 ON t."Id0" = t0."BasketId"

    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"

    SELECT o."Id", o."Address", o."CreatedDate", o."Description", o."OrderCode", o."UpdatedDate", b."Id" AS "Id0", b."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", b."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0", b."UserId"

    INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON o."Id" = b."Id"
    WHERE o."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t

    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"

) AS t0 ON t."Id0" = t0."BasketId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t."Id0", t0."Id"

SELECT t."Id", t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

2025-08-09 13:28:15.494 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."Address", o."CreatedDate", o."Description", o."OrderCode", o."UpdatedDate", b."Id" AS "Id0", b."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", b."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0", b."UserId"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON o."Id" = b."Id"
    WHERE o."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id0" = t0."BasketId"

    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"

SELECT t."Id", t."OrderCode", t."CreatedDate", (
    SELECT COALESCE(sum(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"
